sources.title: River Queen
sources.description: An intimate story set during the 1860s in which a young Irish woman Sarah and her family find themselves on both sides of the turbulent wars between British and Maori during the British colonization of New Zealand.

metadata.Plot: An intimate story set during the 1860s in which a young Irish woman Sarah and her family find themselves on both sides of the turbulent wars between British and Maori during the British colonization of New Zealand.
metadata.Writer: Vincent Ward, Toa Fraser, Kely Lyons
metadata.Actors: Samantha Morton, Kiefer Sutherland, Cliff Curtis
metadata.Country: New Zealand, United Kingdom, United States
